defines.label: Unspecified
defines.comment: A section that is unknown or otherwise unspecified.

defines.label: Abstract
defines.comment: A brief summary of a book, a research article, thesis, review, conference proceeding or any in-depth analysis of a particular subject or discipline, the purpose of which is to help the reader quickly ascertain the publication's purpose.

defines.label: AbstractSection
defines.comment: A section of an abstract

defines.label: ImpactStatement
defines.comment: A brief summary, in lay terms of the impact of the work ('So what?',  'Who cares?' etc.).

defines.label: Authors
defines.comment: A list of items each denoting an author of a particular publication.

defines.label: Contributors
defines.comment: A list of items, each denoting a contributor to a publication where such contributions are insufficient to warrant classification as author.

defines.label: Affiliations
defines.comment: A list of affiliations for the authors and contributors.

defines.label: Introduction
defines.comment: An initial description which states the purpose and goals of the following writing, and, in the case of journal articles, typically includes background information on the research topic and a review of related work in the area.

defines.label: MaterialsAndMethods
defines.comment: A description in a research paper documenting the specialized materials and/or methods used in the work described. This description is contained in a section often entitled 'Methods and Materials', 'Experimental' or a related term.

defines.label: Notes
defines.comment: A list of items that are general notes on the authors, affiliations, or the document.

defines.label: License
defines.comment: A section conveying licensing information about the document.

defines.label: Results
defines.comment: The report of the specific findings of an investigation, given without discussion or conclusion being drawn.

defines.label: Discussion
defines.comment: An interpretation and discussion of the results obtained and an analysis of their significance, in support of conclusions. These conclusions may be part of this discussion or may be included in a separate section of the document.

defines.label: Conclusion
defines.comment: A reflection on the preceding text, summarizing the evidence, arguments or premises presented in the document and their logical outcomes. Conclusions are a fundamental feature in academic research publications, and may be included in the Discussion section.

defines.label: Acknowledgements
defines.comment: Usually part of the preface, or a separate section in its own right, often as part of the back matter, it acknowledges those, including funding agencies, who contributed to the undertaking of a research project described in a publication, or to the creation of the work in some way. In scientific articles, the acknowledgements are usually placed as a separated section immediately following the Discussion or Conclusions.

defines.label: Copyright
defines.comment: A section containing a copyright mention for the document.

defines.label: Disclosure
defines.comment: A section containing acknowledgment of facts that interfere with or could reasonably be perceived as interfering with the full and objective presentation, peer review, editorial decision-making, or publication of research

defines.label: Funding
defines.comment: Person or Organization that funded the research on which a work was based.

defines.label: Keywords
defines.comment: A section containing a list of keywords as part of the document's metadata.

defines.label: SupportingInformation
defines.comment: Any information either auxiliary to the main content of the creative work or required to reproduce or verify the results of the creative work

defines.label: ReferenceList
defines.comment: A list of items each representing a reference to a specific part of the same document, or to another publication.

defines.label: Reference
defines.comment: A reference to a specific part of the document, or to another publication.

defines.label: Formula
defines.comment: A unit of information expressed in mathematical, chemical or logical symbols and language.

defines.label: FormulaObject
defines.comment: A formula object embedded in a web page

defines.label: SoftwareSourceCodeObject
defines.comment: A source code object embedded in a web page

defines.label: Image
defines.comment: An image resource

defines.label: Video
defines.comment: A video resource

defines.label: Audio
defines.comment: An audio resource

defines.label: TableObject
defines.comment: A table object embedded in a web page

defines.label: DocumentObject
defines.comment: The most generic type for creative work encodings that are documents (HTML, LaTEX, DOCX, etc.)

defines.label: Footnote
defines.comment: An ancillary piece of information typically displayed at the bottom of a page.

defines.label: resourceOf
defines.comment: The Graph this node is a resource of

defines.label: suggestedResult
defines.comment: The suggested result of an action

defines.label: Checksum
defines.comment: A small-size datum from an arbitrary block of digital data for the purpose of detecting errors which may have been introduced during its transmission or storage.

defines.label: PerceptualHash
defines.comment: A fingerprint of a multimedia file derived from various features from its content. Unlike cryptographic hash functions which rely on the avalanche effect of small changes in input leading to drastic changes in the output, perceptual hashes are close to one another if the features are similar and are resiliant to transformations such as rotation, skew, contrast adjustment and different compression/formats.

defines.label: contentChecksum
defines.comment: The checksum of a resource.

defines.label: checksumAlgorithm
defines.comment: Name of the algorithm used to compute the checksum value. Examples might include MD5, SHA-1 etc.

defines.label: checksumValue
defines.comment: The actual value of the hash in base64 if no datatype are present.

defines.label: ProgressEvent
defines.comment: An event providing information about the progress status of an action

defines.label: progress
defines.comment: A quantitative measure of the progress of an event

defines.label: AdminPermission
defines.comment: Permission to administrate a resource.

defines.label: CommunicatePermission
defines.comment: Permission to contact other agents based on their roles.

defines.label: InvitePermission
defines.comment: Permission to invite other agents based on their roles.

defines.label: ViewIdentityPermission
defines.comment: Permission to view the identity of other agents based on their roles.

defines.label: numberOfRequiredReviews
defines.comment: The number of reviews required before performing an assess action

defines.label: numberOfRequiredInstances
defines.comment: The number of instances of the action required

defines.label: Error
defines.comment: A runtime error, used to report information beyond the returned status code.

defines.label: Error
defines.comment: The HTTP status code.

defines.label: doi
defines.comment: A digital object identifier (DOI) for the resource.

defines.label: hasSelector
defines.comment: A selector identifying the region of interest within the target resource

defines.label: Selector
defines.comment: The most generic type of Selector

defines.label: selectionContent
defines.comment: The content of the selection

defines.label: selectionHash
defines.comment: The hash of the content of the selection

defines.label: NodeSelector
defines.comment: A type of Selector to select a node within a Graph

defines.label: nodeKey
defines.comment: The key (property) of the node targeted by the selector

defines.label: nodeId
defines.comment: The @id of the node targeted by the selector

defines.label: nodeValueId
defines.comment: The @id of the value targeted by the selector, this is especialy useful when the value is a list

defines.label: WebVerseSelector
defines.comment: A type of selector reasonably resilient to markup modifications and edits of the content

defines.label: webVerseKey
defines.comment: The key of a web verse selector

defines.label: webVerseHash
defines.comment: The hash of a web verse selector

defines.label: webVerseId
defines.comment: The identifier of a web verse selector

defines.label: startOffset
defines.comment: A number representing where a range selection starts

defines.label: endOffset
defines.comment: A number representing where a range selection ends

defines.label: TargetRole
defines.comment: A subclass of Role allowing to specify specific selections of a target resource

defines.label: LinkAction
defines.comment: The act of annotating an object with the motivation of linking it

defines.label: TagAction
defines.comment: The act of annotating an object with the motivation of tagging / classifying it

defines.label: DeauthorizeAction
defines.comment: The antonym of an AuthorizeAction

defines.label: UnassignAction
defines.comment: The antonym of an AssignAction

defines.label: CloneAction
defines.comment: The action of cloning (duplicating) an object

defines.label: PaySeriesAction
defines.comment: A series of PayActions, essentially modelling a subscription with recurring payment.

defines.label: CreateOrganizationAction
defines.comment: An action to create an Organization.

defines.label: AuthorizePaymentAction
defines.comment: An action to authorize payment for an Organization, Person, etc.

defines.label: CreateServiceAction
defines.comment: An action to create a Service.

defines.label: acceptsActionOfType
defines.comment: The type of action accepted by the ServiceChannel.

defines.label: TypesettingAction
defines.comment: The act of typesetting a document

defines.label: CreateSandboxAction
defines.comment: The act of creating a sandbox

defines.label: ResetAction
defines.comment: The act of reseting an object to its canonical state

defines.label: Graph
defines.comment: A graph

defines.label: slug
defines.comment: Part of a URL that identifies a page in human-readable keywords

defines.label: ContributorRole
defines.comment: A subclass of Role used to describe contributor roles.

defines.label: roleAffiliation
defines.comment: The affiliation under which the role was performed.

defines.label: roleContactPoint
defines.comment: A contact point for the person or organization behind an authoring role.

defines.label: permissionScope
defines.comment: The scope of a permission.

defines.label: audienceScope
defines.comment: The scope of a audience.

defines.label: SponsorRole
defines.comment: A subclass of Role used to describe sponsoring roles.

defines.label: FunderRole
defines.comment: A subclass of Role used to describe funding (financing) roles.

defines.label: roleOffer
defines.comment: An offer made by the role's sponsor or funder.

defines.label: FundingSource
defines.comment: The most generic type of funding source

defines.label: roleAction
defines.comment: Indicates an action in which the role acts as an 'agent'.

defines.label: DisclosureAction
defines.comment: The act of making a disclosure.

defines.label: AcknowledgeAction
defines.comment: The act of acknowledging someone, with no expectation of a response.

defines.label: UploadAction
defines.comment: The act of uploading an object to an entry point within some Web-based protocol.

defines.label: CreateGraphAction
defines.comment: The act of creating a graph.

defines.label: CreateWorkflowStageAction
defines.comment: The act of creating a workflow stage.

defines.label: DeleteGraphAction
defines.comment: The act of deleting a graph.

defines.label: CreateReleaseAction
defines.comment: The act of creating a release (snapshot) of an object.

defines.label: CreatePeriodicalAction
defines.comment: The act of creating a periodical.

defines.label: CreateOfferAction
defines.comment: The act of creating an Offer.

defines.label: MimeDetectionAction
defines.comment: The act of detecting the MIME type of an object.

defines.label: ImageProcessingAction
defines.comment: The act of converting an image object to web first format and extracting metadata about the object.

defines.label: AudioVideoProcessingAction
defines.comment: The act of converting an audio or video object to web first format and extracting metadata about the object.

defines.label: RDFaConversionAction
defines.comment: The act of converting an object to RDFa (HTML web document with rich structured data markup).

defines.label: SemanticTaggingAction
defines.comment: The act of extracting semantic tags provided by web ontologies (OWL) or vocabularies (RDF Schema) from an object.

defines.label: Tag
defines.comment: A non-hierarchical keyword or term assigned to a piece of information

defines.label: Facet
defines.comment: A facet used in faceted search

defines.label: Tag
defines.comment: A facet computed over a range

defines.label: itemListFacet
defines.comment: Facets computed from the ItemList

defines.label: count
defines.comment: Total number of a collection of items

defines.label: expectedDuration
defines.comment: The expected duration of an Action

defines.label: activatedTime
defines.comment: The time when the action was activated

defines.label: dateRejected
defines.comment: The rejection date

defines.label: resultOf
defines.comment: The Action which resulted in this Thing

defines.label: CssVariable
defines.comment: A CSS variable

defines.label: styleGuide
defines.comment: A style guide used in the creation of the CreativeWork

defines.label: StyleGuide
defines.comment: A style guide

defines.label: style
defines.comment: describes how the creative work should be styled

defines.label: encodesStyle
defines.comment: the CSS asset encoded by this MediaObject

defines.label: isStyleOf
defines.comment: the CreativeWork styled by this style

defines.label: detailedDescription
defines.comment: A detailed description (such as a named or structured abstract) of the item.

defines.label: articleFrontMatter
defines.comment: The article front matter

defines.label: articleBackMatter
defines.comment: The article back matter
